JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Full-time cleaning assistant wanted for Knudhule Badehotel as soon as possible
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Full-time cleaning assistant wanted for Knudhule Badehotel as soon as possible

We are looking for a cleaning assistant for tidying rooms, cabins, and public areas. It is a full-time, full-year position. You will work on weekdays and weekends according to a rolling schedule as part of our cleaning team.

We offer:

  • Varied work with good colleagues
  • Good working conditions, pay according to qualifications
  • Temporary accommodation if needed

We expect:

  • That you want to work with cleaning, and that you are thorough
  • That you are extrovert and pleasant around guests and colleagues
  • That you can communicate in English, German, or Danish

About the hotel

Knudhule Badehotel is located outside the town of Ry overlooking the beautiful lake Knudsø. It offers a la carte, stays, parties, and conferences. The hotel has 30 rooms and cabins and has room for parties with up to 250 guests. Our very popular a la carte restaurant Gastronomisk Institut focuses on wine and gastronomy and has a well-stocked wine cellar. The hotel has been run by Dean Jespersen and Anders Kalstrup since 2013. It has 2 stars in Den Danske Spiseguide (the Danish Dining Guide) and is open all year.

 

Contact Anders Kalstrup at info@knudhule.dk or tel. +4586891407 for more information.

Der er 1 ledig stilling
